short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and organize your open tabs into collections. and resue them to open all tabs with one click!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Meet TabWizz – Your Ultimate Tab Manager! 🚀

Say goodbye to messy tabs and chaotic browsing! TabWizz is here to transform the way you manage your tabs—organize, save, and open your tabs in a flash!

🌀 What Can TabWizz Do for You?
🗂️ Save Your Tabs into Collections: Effortlessly group your open tabs into custom collections—perfect for keeping all your research, projects, or tasks in one place!
🏷️ Name Your Collections: Personalize your collections with unique names—no more guessing which tabs go where!
⚡ One-Click Magic: Instantly reopen all the tabs in any collection with a single click! Jump back into your work without retracing your steps through history.
🧹 Clean & Simple Tab Management: Easily edit or delete collections as your tasks change—keep only what’s relevant.
🚨 Why TabWizz? 🚨
No more tab overload: Save the tabs you need and close the rest, knowing you can access them anytime with TabWizz.
No more hunting through history: Stop wasting time searching for that one site—TabWizz keeps everything you need just one click away!
Perfect for multitaskers: Whether you’re researching, studying, or managing multiple projects, TabWizz keeps you organized and efficient.
✨ Get TabWizz Now! ✨ Make your browser smarter, faster, and more organized. The best part? It's free and super easy to use!
